---
title: "Creating a template raster"
output: html_document
---

Create a template raster with mollweide coordinate reference system and 10km resolution (=100 km2 cell area).

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(here)
```

```{r}

x <- raster::raster()
x <- raster::setValues(x, 1)
resolution <- 10000
s.crs <- "+proj=moll"

template_rast <- raster::projectRaster(x, crs=s.crs, res=resolution, progress="text")

raster::writeRaster(template_rast, here("spatial/output/template_raster.tif"))

```
